author: kagami#6142, Wyn
name: SysInfo
description: Uses psutil to show various system information for the machine running the bot
install_msg:
Thank you for installing SysInfo from RitsuCogs/Wyn-RedV3Cogs.
Commands are in [sysinfo|sys] group. [p]help sys
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
